instruction: Summarize the impact of energy access on economic, social and environmental aspects across the world.
output: The impact of energy access has been well-documented in various studies, showing mostly positive effects on economic, social and environmental aspects across the world, for all levels of development, and in the short- and long-term. These studies have shown that energy access can improve health outcomes, increase productivity, reduce poverty, and mitigate climate change. Additionally, energy access can also improve education, increase income, and enhance the overall quality of life.
